description:
If the AMQP stops during api call in a list as follows, the "creating” status  record  added to the Database in nova.volume.api . 
We can not delete "creating" status record from API, so we can not delete it.

-List of API
create_snapshot
create_volume
delete_snapshot
delete_volume
title: A garbage record in DB created if the AMQP stopped in nova.volume.api

comments.content:
If the AMQP stops during api call in a list as follows, the "creating” status  record  added to the Database in nova.volume.api . 
We can not delete "creating" status record from API, so we can not delete it.
